body_html:
The Windows API difference and the splash damage to GCS doesn't sound great. Maybe Env::MatchPath needs to be moved onto the FileSystem interface and then fnmatch() written from scratch for Windows.

I haven't examined these functions as closely as you. Could you help me gain a better understanding of what sort of impact you can envision this issue having?

cc: @mrry

body:
The Windows API difference and the splash damage to GCS doesn't sound great. Maybe Env::MatchPath needs to be moved onto the FileSystem interface and then fnmatch() written from scratch for Windows.

I haven't examined these functions as closely as you. Could you help me gain a better understanding of what sort of impact you can envision this issue having?

cc: @mrry
